data.current_summary: Obtiene los activos financieros y el detalle de su composicin
data.current_description: Obtiene los activos financieros y el detalle de su composicin de carteras de inversin compuestas por acciones o fondos, tarjetas de crdito, seguros y prstamos. Incluye informacin de titularidad de cada uno de los activos as como identificadores nicos que facilitan el tratamiento del dato. Es posible obtener datos Mock. Consulte con el equipo tcnico cmo hacerlo.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve financial assets and portfolio composition details
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves comprehensive financial asset information for an authenticated user, including investment portfolios (stocks and funds), credit cards, insurance products, and loans. Returns detailed composition data with ownership information and unique identifiers for each asset. Supports mock data retrieval for testing purposes. Requires authentication and entity credentials in the request body. Returns user_information, portfolios, accounts, cards, and properties objects.
data.reasoning: Original summary is identical to GET /entities operation, creating confusion about the operation's purpose. Added clarity about the POST method's purpose, required request parameters, response schema components, and mock data support for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'get_/error-codes' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Original summary is too generic ('Listado de cdigos de error'). Description mixes operational guidance with implementation advice in an unclear way, making it difficult for AI agents to understand the operation's primary purpose and response structure. Missing information about what parameters are accepted (1 parameter mentioned but not described) and what the response structure contains. Improved summary to be action-oriented and added clarity about response structure, error handling strategies, and the operation's role in application error management.

data.current_description: Listado de cdigos de error. Presta especial atencin a que no todos los cdigos de error deben recibir el mismo tratamiento por parte de tu aplicacin. Ante un error de password incorrecto no debes reintentar la llamada con los mismos parmetros, pero ante un error que te indique que la entidad est en mantenimiento s puedes reintentarlo. Pide una sesin tcnica con nuestro equipo para resolver cualquier duda sobre la gestin de errores.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve error codes and handling guidance
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the complete list of error codes used by the Wealth Reader API with their descriptions and recommended handling strategies. Different error codes require different application responses: authentication errors (e.g., incorrect password) should not be retried with the same parameters, while maintenance errors should be retried. Returns error-codes array with code, description, and handling recommendations. Use this operation to implement proper error handling logic in your application. Consult the technical team for specific error handling scenarios.
